name: Gakuen Karlisle ~ Fleeting Feelings ~
description:
You've just transferred to Gakuen Karlisle, where a war for school life dominance is raging at full speed!

In the meantime, though, which anime boy of your dreams will you fall in love with?

~~~

CONTENT WARNINGS: 

  • blood 
  • descriptions/implied violence, gore, kidnapping, death 
  • swearing 
  • flashing lights

~~~

[my note:] 

HAPPY (late...) APRIL FOOLS ! ! ! 

i pranked twomaeda on the morning of april fools and then i was like no i need to come up with something better so i made this 

i hope everyone can play it and enjoy it! it's a nonsense game, because i keep on writing nonsense things... ............ i think i should get a dartboard. 

~~~

[gameplay notes:] 

you can change your name (but the MC is a girl referred to with she/her)

there are two routes, Mordriel (right on cover img) and Julian (left on cover img). and 1 bad end + 2 happy ends total.
